counter_msg: Number of %s Docs Missing or Incorrect Info: %d
description: Validate YML metadata in an md file for Jekyll usage. Set no_arg_check to True in the OSScheckeys.json file, when using this program under a script. Check the .readme file for more information of the JSON file
grep_err: Unable to run the follow command: %s , make sure you are running this script under a bash shell environment
hlp_default: Use a default replacement file passed in a JSON format
hlp_example: Use an example YML values file passed in a JSON format
hlp_lst: List or docs passed with a space delimited, doc name must be passed with commas e.g. 'docs_1' 'doc_2' ... 'doc_N'
hlp_not_yml_check: when this option is used, YML stucture check, will be ignored. if -oy is used as well, both options will be ignored
hlp_only_yml_check: when this option is used, only YML structure will be checked, not metadata value:pair will be reviewed. if -ny is used as well, both options will be ignored
hlp_template: Use a docs template file passed in a JSON format
hlp_verbose: Log level, set a level from the program parameters -ll or use OSScheckkeys.json file under [log_level]. Levels: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR --default
http_in_link: Invalid link, 'http: or https:' are not permited as part of a link (%s)
invalid_layout: Layout '%s' does not exist. Use a valid layout located at _layouts directory
no_argv:
When no arguments are passed, will attempt to scan all 'md' files under %s.
For more information use %s --help.
Would you like to continue (yes/no)?:
no_layout_dir: Unable to find _layouts directory, _layouts are required to build a Jekyll site
no_type: MISSING <type:value> PAIR type: IS MANDATORY FOR ALL RUNBOOKS
no_yml: Dealing with Doc with NO metadata in it.
results_msg: Please add/correct metadata in this/these Doc(s).
yml_failed: DOC DID NOT PASS YAML VERIFICATION
